title: Introducing Call of Duty: Mobile Season 7 — Phantom Current
description: The post Introducing Call of Duty: Mobile Season 7 — Phantom Current appeared first on Xbox Wire.
author: Mike Nelson, Xbox Wire Editor
categories: Call of Duty: Mobile Season 7 — Phantom Current
excerpt: Dive beneath the surface in Call of Duty: Mobile Season 7 — Phantom Current and unlock high-seas themed rewards in the Battle Pass, race to the finish in an all-new RC-XD Car Racing Mode, battle with new Mythic Operator Dark Shepherd, and escape the Gulag for the first time in Call of Duty: Mobile.
text: Dive beneath the surface in Call of Duty: Mobile Season 7 — Phantom Current and unlock high-seas themed rewards in the Battle Pass, race to the finish in an all-new RC-XD Car Racing Mode, battle with new Mythic Operator Dark Shepherd, and escape the Gulag for the first time in Call of Duty: Mobile. Dive beneath the surface for Call of Duty®: Mobile Season 7 — Phantom Current.  Race to the finish in the new RC-XD Car Racing Multiplayer Mode, embrace the darkness with the Dark Sheperd Mythic Draw, and grab themed content in one Lucky Draw and in-game event with the Girl’s Frontline collaboration. And for the first time ever in Call of Duty: Mobile, Gulag appears as a limited-time event.  Explore the mysteries of the deep in this season’s Battle Pass with the MG 82 LMG, the Drill Charge Reskin C4, and a new Bomb Drone Scorestreak, as well as a variety of nautical-themed Weapon Blueprints, Operator Skins, Bundles, and more. Season 7 — Phantom Current launches on July 30 at 5 PM PT. Multiplayer: New Mode Race to the Finish in RC-XD Car Racing, Mini Mayhem High speed and high stakes! In the turbo new Multiplayer Mode — Mini Mayhem, players can race out with RC-XD cars on several maps. Play solo or race with up to eight friends in multi-lap competitions. Push the pedal to the metal to dash forward and overtake opponents; but be careful — tumble into a death zone and cars will immediately explode, forcing drivers to respawn at the nearest checkpoint. Win races to climb the leaderboard and unlock custom vehicle skins.  Battle Royale: Gulag Arrives For the first time in Call of Duty: Mobile, Gulag arrives as a limited-time event, exclusively to the Isolated Map in Season 7. After the first elimination, players will be transported to a 1v1 deathmatch. Survive to redeploy or perish and spectate until a teammate buys back your dog tag at the Buy Station. All players will be granted one default Gulag attempt and more can be secured with Gulag Tickets, available in the Buy Station.  New Wildcard – Skill Overdrive  Dive head-first into the deep end when you equip an extra Operator Skill with the new MP Wildcard. But be forewarned, powerful capabilities come at great cost and may upset the delicate balance. Phantom Current Battle Pass: New Weapon, Scorestreak The Phantom Current Battle Pass features free and premium items, including new Operator Skins, Weapon, Scorestreak, and additional Call of Duty Points to spend on your next Premium Pass or Store purchase. Battle Pass Free Tiers Sink your enemies with the new MG 82 LMG and its blistering rate of fire and high magazine capacity. Take to the skies with the new Score Streak Bomb Drone and earn other free tier rewards including a variety of Skins, Weapons Blueprints, Vault Coins, and more.  Premium Pass Tiers Purchase the Premium Pass for a chance to catch all new content in the Phantom Current stream, including Farah — Stealth, Kreuger — Deep Six, Ethan — AQUA-44, and Stone —Painkiller. Brave the dark tides with Weapon Blueprints like the KN-44 — Angler, QQ9 —Odyssey 09, Peacekeeper MK2 — Technautilus, XPR-50 — Hydrofoil, and the MG 82 —Dreadnought, based on the new Season 7 Weapon. Battle Pass Subscriptions: Enlist with the Ground Forces by purchasing a Battle Pass Subscription, granting additional monthly rewards along with a 10% boost to Player and Weapon XP, discount coupons, and limited discounts on 10x crate pulls. The Season 7 Ground Forces will unlock the Zane — Monsoon Season Operator Skin, SKS — Carrier Strike Weapon Blueprint, and Backpack — Carrier Strike. Season 7 In-Game Events  Challenge Pass: Complete Standard, Special, and Elite Missions to progress through the Season 7 Challenge Pass. Use your earned Challenge Tokens to purchase items in the Exchange including various Summer themed weapon skins and rewards, including Soap — Toxic Splash, Tak-5 — Propeller, and the Jet Skies camo series. Secret Caches: A new legendary weapon is ready to start progressing towards, the RUS-79U — Mystical Lamp. This high-quality new weapon comes alongside a Secret Cache Milestone system, offering more rewards for players who regularly interacting with Secret Caches.  Girls Frontline: The latest collaboration to come to Call of Duty: Mobile also comes with its own free event rewards! This event will have a variety of tasks and ways to earn rewards, whether it is through basic daily login tasks or more complicated challenges tied to Battle Royale or Multiplayer matches. Check the in-game Events tab throughout the season for new ways to earn free rewards. You can find all of these in-game events through the Events tab on the left-hand side of the main lobby.  Store Update: New Mythic Draw, Girls Frontline New Mythic Operator Draw: Step into the void and embrace the darkness with the Dark Shepherd, featuring reaper-like armor and his trademark scythe. This Draw features the menacing Operator as well as two new Weapon Blueprints: deadly Legendary weapon AS-VAL — Shadow Marksman, and Legendary Scythe — Soldering Edge, a razor-edged melee weapon sure to strike fear in the hearts of your enemies.  Once you’ve acquired Dark Shepherd — Phantom, a Mythic upgrade path will be unlocked to help provide options to truly customize this operator. This upgrade path features upgraded visuals for his skin, new kill effects, new weapon reticles, custom Battle Royale visuals, and more.  Girls’ Frontline Release: Girls’ Frontline is here for the first time in this version of Call of Duty: Mobile, so don’t miss your chance to grab themed content in a lucky draw, bundle, and Strongbox.  The lucky draw features the Scylla — ASM10 operator and the ASM10 — Girls’ Frontline ASM10 legendary weapon. The Bundle features an additional legendary weapon while the Strongbox has over a dozen weapons, camos, and more all themed around different characters from Girls Frontline. New Legendary Draws: Rule the high seas with the Legendary Nyx Skin and the USS 9 —Spectral Seas in the Bloody Seas Lucky Draw. In the Fathomless Lucky Draw, pick up items like the deep-sea ready Bathysphere Operator skin and a Legendary JAK-12 — Briny Deep Weapon Blueprint. Reach peak combat prowess with the Lustre Operator Skin and Grau 5.56 — Immense Tides Weapon Blueprint in the Broken Tides Lucky Draw. Double CP Event: Once again, earn double the purchased COD Points (CP) throughout Season 7, a great chance to continue boosting your in-game currency for your next valued purchases. All of which can be purchased in-game or through the Web Store for select regions.  Battle Pass Vault: Two Battle Passes make their way to the Vault this season — Zombies Are Back (Season 9, 2022) and Ultimate Frontier (Season 11, 2022).  Season 7 — Phantom Current launches on Call of Duty: Mobile on July 30 at 5PM PT. See you online. For the latest Call of Duty Mobile news, visit the Call of Duty: Mobile website, as well as Call of Duty: Mobile on YouTube. Also follow Call of Duty: Mobile on X, Instagram, and Facebook. For the latest Call of Duty intel, visit Call of Duty, as well as Call of Duty on YouTube. Also follow @Activision on X, Instagram, and Facebook.
html:
Dive beneath the surface in Call of Duty: Mobile Season 7 — Phantom Current and unlock high-seas themed rewards in the Battle Pass, race to the finish in an all-new RC-XD Car Racing Mode, battle with new Mythic Operator Dark Shepherd, and escape the Gulag for the first time in Call of Duty: Mobile.

Dive beneath the surface for Call of Duty®: Mobile Season 7 — Phantom Current.  Race to the finish in the new RC-XD Car Racing Multiplayer Mode, embrace the darkness with the Dark Sheperd Mythic Draw, and grab themed content in one Lucky Draw and in-game event with the Girl’s Frontline collaboration. And for the first time ever in Call of Duty: Mobile, Gulag appears as a limited-time event. 

Explore the mysteries of the deep in this season’s Battle Pass with the MG 82 LMG, the Drill Charge Reskin C4, and a new Bomb Drone Scorestreak, as well as a variety of nautical-themed Weapon Blueprints, Operator Skins, Bundles, and more.

Season 7 — Phantom Current launches on July 30 at 5 PM PT.

Multiplayer: New Mode

Race to the Finish in RC-XD Car Racing, Mini Mayhem

High speed and high stakes! In the turbo new Multiplayer Mode — Mini Mayhem, players can race out with RC-XD cars on several maps. Play solo or race with up to eight friends in multi-lap competitions. Push the pedal to the metal to dash forward and overtake opponents; but be careful — tumble into a death zone and cars will immediately explode, forcing drivers to respawn at the nearest checkpoint. Win races to climb the leaderboard and unlock custom vehicle skins. 

Battle Royale: Gulag Arrives

For the first time in Call of Duty: Mobile, Gulag arrives as a limited-time event, exclusively to the Isolated Map in Season 7. After the first elimination, players will be transported to a 1v1 deathmatch. Survive to redeploy or perish and spectate until a teammate buys back your dog tag at the Buy Station. All players will be granted one default Gulag attempt and more can be secured with Gulag Tickets, available in the Buy Station. 

New Wildcard – Skill Overdrive 

Dive head-first into the deep end when you equip an extra Operator Skill with the new MP Wildcard. But be forewarned, powerful capabilities come at great cost and may upset the delicate balance.

Phantom Current Battle Pass: New Weapon, Scorestreak

The Phantom Current Battle Pass features free and premium items, including new Operator Skins, Weapon, Scorestreak, and additional Call of Duty Points to spend on your next Premium Pass or Store purchase.

Battle Pass Free Tiers

Sink your enemies with the new MG 82 LMG and its blistering rate of fire and high magazine capacity. Take to the skies with the new Score Streak Bomb Drone and earn other free tier rewards including a variety of Skins, Weapons Blueprints, Vault Coins, and more. 

Premium Pass Tiers

Purchase the Premium Pass for a chance to catch all new content in the Phantom Current stream, including Farah — Stealth, Kreuger — Deep Six, Ethan — AQUA-44, and Stone —Painkiller. Brave the dark tides with Weapon Blueprints like the KN-44 — Angler, QQ9 —Odyssey 09, Peacekeeper MK2 — Technautilus, XPR-50 — Hydrofoil, and the MG 82 —Dreadnought, based on the new Season 7 Weapon.

Battle Pass Subscriptions: Enlist with the Ground Forces by purchasing a Battle Pass Subscription, granting additional monthly rewards along with a 10% boost to Player and Weapon XP, discount coupons, and limited discounts on 10x crate pulls.

The Season 7 Ground Forces will unlock the Zane — Monsoon Season Operator Skin, SKS — Carrier Strike Weapon Blueprint, and Backpack — Carrier Strike.

Season 7 In-Game Events 

Challenge Pass: Complete Standard, Special, and Elite Missions to progress through the Season 7 Challenge Pass. Use your earned Challenge Tokens to purchase items in the Exchange including various Summer themed weapon skins and rewards, including Soap — Toxic Splash, Tak-5 — Propeller, and the Jet Skies camo series.

Secret Caches: A new legendary weapon is ready to start progressing towards, the RUS-79U — Mystical Lamp. This high-quality new weapon comes alongside a Secret Cache Milestone system, offering more rewards for players who regularly interacting with Secret Caches. 

Girls Frontline: The latest collaboration to come to Call of Duty: Mobile also comes with its own free event rewards! This event will have a variety of tasks and ways to earn rewards, whether it is through basic daily login tasks or more complicated challenges tied to Battle Royale or Multiplayer matches. Check the in-game Events tab throughout the season for new ways to earn free rewards. You can find all of these in-game events through the Events tab on the left-hand side of the main lobby. 

Store Update: New Mythic Draw, Girls Frontline

New Mythic Operator Draw: Step into the void and embrace the darkness with the Dark Shepherd, featuring reaper-like armor and his trademark scythe. This Draw features the menacing Operator as well as two new Weapon Blueprints: deadly Legendary weapon AS-VAL — Shadow Marksman, and Legendary Scythe — Soldering Edge, a razor-edged melee weapon sure to strike fear in the hearts of your enemies. 

Once you’ve acquired Dark Shepherd — Phantom, a Mythic upgrade path will be unlocked to help provide options to truly customize this operator. This upgrade path features upgraded visuals for his skin, new kill effects, new weapon reticles, custom Battle Royale visuals, and more. 

Girls’ Frontline Release: Girls’ Frontline is here for the first time in this version of Call of Duty: Mobile, so don’t miss your chance to grab themed content in a lucky draw, bundle, and Strongbox. 

The lucky draw features the Scylla — ASM10 operator and the ASM10 — Girls’ Frontline ASM10 legendary weapon. The Bundle features an additional legendary weapon while the Strongbox has over a dozen weapons, camos, and more all themed around different characters from Girls Frontline.

New Legendary Draws: Rule the high seas with the Legendary Nyx Skin and the USS 9 —Spectral Seas in the Bloody Seas Lucky Draw. In the Fathomless Lucky Draw, pick up items like the deep-sea ready Bathysphere Operator skin and a Legendary JAK-12 — Briny Deep Weapon Blueprint. Reach peak combat prowess with the Lustre Operator Skin and Grau 5.56 — Immense Tides Weapon Blueprint in the Broken Tides Lucky Draw.

Double CP Event: Once again, earn double the purchased COD Points (CP) throughout Season 7, a great chance to continue boosting your in-game currency for your next valued purchases. All of which can be purchased in-game or through the Web Store for select regions. 

Battle Pass Vault: Two Battle Passes make their way to the Vault this season — Zombies Are Back (Season 9, 2022) and Ultimate Frontier (Season 11, 2022). 

Season 7 — Phantom Current launches on Call of Duty: Mobile on July 30 at 5PM PT.

See you online.

For the latest Call of Duty Mobile news, visit the Call of Duty: Mobile website, as well as Call of Duty: Mobile on YouTube. Also follow Call of Duty: Mobile on X, Instagram, and Facebook.

For the latest Call of Duty intel, visit Call of Duty, as well as Call of Duty on YouTube. Also follow Call of Duty on X, Instagram and Facebook.
